quest.name: A Beeautiful Plan
objectives: Stand at the destination and examine the murals.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: The bag is sealed tight, but I'd rather not keep the bees buzzing about in there longer than we have to.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: The Children's settlement is to the west, a place they call Woven Oath.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: According to the guard, there is an airway apart from the entrance which leads to the spiders' nests.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: If the fates are kind, the way will be clear.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: We should move quickly, before any of the Children arrive.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Up there is the airway. Do you see it?

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: A bit far, perhaps, but we should be able to toss the bag through.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Though we should probably loosen the ropes keeping it closed. Enough that it falls open when it lands inside.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: May I do the honors?

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: That should do it. Now we wait...

dialogue.name: SCREAM03330
dialogue.text: (-Villager of the Everlasting Dark-)What is that!?

dialogue.name: SCREAM03330
dialogue.text: (-Villager of the Everlasting Dark-)Bees! By the abyss, they're everywhere!

dialogue.name: SCREAM03330
dialogue.text: (-Villager of the Everlasting Dark-)Help! Someone help! We have to save the spiders!

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: It sounds like our plan is working.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Still, it is quite likely not all were drawn away from their posts.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: If you should come to blows with the Children, I'll see to it any signs of struggle are concealed. Failing that, I'll create a distraction to buy Y'shtola more time.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Should anyone get past me, it falls to you to guard her.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Your concern is appreciated, but I sincerely doubt it will come to that.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Why do I get the feeling you enjoy the idea of my loafing about bored in the shadows?

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Come now, Thancred. The shadows are a fitting place for a Warrior of Darkness. Now, if you both are ready?

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Go on. I'll be right behind you.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: The Font of Seeing suggests this is a chamber for prayer. At the very least, they would not place this near potential distractions from their worship.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Perhaps the monument is further in.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Yes, this is it.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: I will be but a moment. Keep watch of the entryway.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: On second thought, would you mind examining the murals on these walls while I look over this?

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: At a glance, I can tell they are old. Predating the founding of the Blessed and the Children, in fact.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: We're not like to come here a second time. 'Twould behoove us to learn all that we can.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Hmmm... Then what does this mean...?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Examine the murals and take note of what events they may depict. You may move the camera as well as zoom in and out. Target a mural and examine it with ÓÅë[???] / [???].

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Good to see my distraction proved successful.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: I believe I now have everything needed to finish deciphering the tablet.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Tell me, Forename, did the murals appear to be of any significance?

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Depictions of heroes? From the age of gods, the Ronkan Empire, and immediately before the Flood.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Very astute observations. Perhaps in another lifetime you could be a curator of antiquities.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Though it has no bearing on the task at hand, perhaps that knowledge may prove to be of use in the future.
